marketing_descs.marketing_desc:
Chaparral 265SSi year of manufacture 2005, fitted with a 5.7 GXi V8 petrol with a reconditioned as good as new DPS-A outdrive with Stainless steel props, standing on Speedline triple axle braking trailer. Garmin 551s GPS plotter, depth gauge, new stereo system, led lighting, complete with 2 berth, small galley, toilet and shower. The boat also has covers to cover the boat, making it an ideal weekender for comfort.

For berthing she has 4 fenders and some ropes, trailer is road legal and the boat with no fluids in her is on the 3.5 tonne limit, so towing her needs the right vehicle and experience.

This boat has been rebuilt completely and is in top condition, new engine installed which was supplied in a crate, a reconditioned as new DPS-A outdrive, new cover, rebuilt trailer, new batteries, new decals.

Many receipts for the expenditure will be provided.

The hull has been cut back and buffed to the original condition, new decals installed so looks like new. Cover is brand new, seating now fully restored, interior is excellent for its year.

Engine is a brand new crate engine with 2 hours on it and we have installed a brand new tacho with hours clock built in to match the engine, the transom shield is new and the outdrive is completely reconditioned as good as new, new exhaust manifolds and risers.

Chaparral SSi 19OB Sport

Exceptional value joins quality and style in the widely popular 19OB Sport. Stainless steel hardware, non-skid flooring, and battery on-off switch go one-up on rivals. Storage is abundant...under the seats, in the helm, in a wakeboard sized floor locker and there's also a cooler under the back seat. A high quality sound system is enhanced with both USB and MP3 jacks. Key options include snap-in cockpit carpet, a swim platform mat and a Velocity Folding Arch Tower

Options include:
Gel Coated Entire Hull - Alloy Gray
VX Sport Graphic - Black/Red
Yamaha Four Stroke F115XB 115HP 25" Can be upgraded to F130 Yamaha fourstroke,

Beach Weave Snap-In Flooring Sterling
CE Package Includes CE Hull Serial Number, European Symbols, CE Capacity Plate, Multi-Language Owner's Manual (Includes Completed Boat Data Record Form), Manual Bilge Pump, Foil Face Foam Engine Compartment and Battery Box(es) (Fire Extinguisher Required)

Viewing by appointment only

2016 FinnMaster 62DC Day Cruiser 

This 2016 FinnMaster 62DC is an eye-catching example of her class in its almost showroom condition. It combined the practicality of a family cruiser with the advantage of a cuddy berth for nights away. The addition of the full cockpit bimini you can use your boat whatever the weather, powered by an efficient and powerful 150hp 4-stroke outboard motor. Her cockpit layout includes twin twist and bolster seats, a wraparound rear bench seat that allows a central table or full sun pad. This boat has full teak in the cockpit and on the bow. Huge amounts of storage onboard found in the bow and stern. Lying ashore in Southampton and available to view 7 days a week.

Powered by a Single Yamaha 150hp Outboard with 74 engine hours use

Boat come with Roller Road Trailer with all CE Certification

-       Removable Table

-       Full Teak Floor in Cockpit and Bow

-       Fully Enclosed Canopy with Canopy Garage 

-       Galley and Sink

Finnmaster T7 Day Cruiser

Welcome to the future of boat ownership. The new Finnmaster T7 shows the way with its streamlined hull and the innovative LED docking lights on the bow. T7 is totally unique, the perfect meeting between modern top design and practical details. We have included everything here, from a sporty appearance with speedy character to cosy comfort for all the family. This means that, thanks to our Smart Design concept, we have made it possible for all of the family to relax together in the cockpit either at the teak table or on the sun bed, which is easy to convert when it is as hot as it gets during the day. There is also plenty of room to spend the night in the bow, which features a large double bed and a toilet.

FINNMASTER PILOT 8

The Pilot 8 is our largest cabin boat. A model without compromise, built for a long life at sea. Whether you are looking for a fishing boat, an excursion boat or a boat where the whole family can spend the night – this is the boat for you. The Pilot 8 shows its strength with its large cockpit in the stern and with the roomy steering cabin where there is room for four people to sit securely, warm and comfortably – whatever the weather. The cabin has a galley and in the bow, apart from considerable storage space, there is a large separate toilet as well as sleeping berths for four adults.

Trim Tabs
Shore Power Hook Up with Battery Charger
Hot and Cold Water systems
Windlass Electic Anchor System
Full Canvas Pack with Bimini

Fitted with Twin Yamaha F150hp

SMART DESIGN

At Finnmaster, we have designed and manufactured boats at our boatyard in Finland for more than 25 years. Over these years, we have worked hard to develop smart solutions that, for example, mean there is always somewhere for you to stow the fenders, just seconds after casting off. Nor do you need to move the cushions when you want to stow anything in the storage space. We call our concept Smart Design. It means we tailor the form to the content to make life at sea easier – whatever you use your boat for. These solutions do not only help to tie together well thought-out and practical details with smart and modern design they mean above all that the skilled captain and the curious novice can both have wonderful experiences at sea.

Super Air Nautique GS20 2018, 

The 20-footer that redefined what a multi-sport towboat can do, our Super Air Nautique GS20 is the most versatile boat in the industry. If you want to pull a skier through a slalom course in the morning, take a wakeboard set at lunch and finish the day with a wakesurf session, the GS20 was made for you. Award-winning technology, beautiful aesthetics and quality that is second to none: that’s the GS20.

For the 2018 model year, the Super Air Nautique GS20 is boasting a brand-new JL Audio MM100s head unit that delivers crisp, clear sound into the JL Audio speakers. This boat comes standard with the MX Series package, which includes 4 JL Audio speakers throughout the boat and a 2-channel JL Audio amplifier. Move up to the MX Series Studio Premier package that adds 2 additional speakers, a 10” subwoofer and steps up to a 6-channel JL Audio amplifier.

2019 Finnmaster P6 Cabin

The Finnmaster P6 is a stylish and modern cabin boat that surpasses your expectations. The Finnmaster P6 will give you a comfortable, stable and safe ride. This is an agile cabin boat for transportation, leisure and for number of other purposes at sea. The Finnmaster P6 has a steady hull that works perfect in all conditions and delivers high-quality performance with a driving experience beyond the usual. The spacious layout combined with a cozy and well-planned cabin, where you have a good visibility and the opportunity to stay overnight, guarantees you have everything you need for different kind of trips. Finnmaster Smart Design solutions complement the comfort and safety aboard.

Whether you're trolling with hooks in the water or running through rough seas in search of a trophy catch, Robalo's new R272 center console flagship sparks an adrenaline rush unlike any other fishing boat. Unique style. Phenomenal overall performance. Dry ride. Best-in-class features. The R272 is primed to tackle any fishing adventure. Husky R8 by Finnmaster

The Finnmaster Husky R8 is a well built aluminium boat which is equally agile as ready for comfort. Thanks to its well designed aluminium hull, the Finnmaster Husky R8 takes rough sea in an agile and easily manoeuvrable manner. In this aluminium boat the high performance is clearly noticed when the adjustable offshore seats make sure that the driver and the passengers sit ergonomically and comfortably – in all kinds of weather. In the fore, there is an L-shaped sofa which contributes to high comfort for your passengers. The high windscreen protects all your passengers and you sit comfortably and safely in the big U-shaped sofa in the aft. A space that may also be converted into a big sun deck when the weather allows. The Finnmaster Husky R8 aluminium boat is the perfect choice if you respect high quality, space and our smart design solutions.

All new for 2019, Chaparral is re-writing the rules on boating. The 277 SSX is a trendsetter in design, performance, and function. SMART DESIGN

At Finnmaster, we have designed and manufactured boats at our boatyard in Finland for more than 25 years. Over these years, we have worked hard to develop smart solutions that, for example, mean there is always somewhere for you to stow the fenders, just seconds after casting off. Nor do you need to move the cushions when you want to stow anything in the storage space. We call our concept Smart Design. It means we tailor the form to the content to make life at sea easier – whatever you use your boat for. These solutions do not only help to tie together well thought-out and practical details with smart and modern design they mean above all that the skilled captain and the curious novice can both have wonderful experiences at sea.

Husky R7 By Finnmaster

Husky Boats are imported into the UK by idealboat.com

Chaparral Vortex 203 vr
 
Unique in every way, the 203 VR crafts a sleek, classy profile with dry-riding freeboard and Chaparral quality to bring jet boat design to a whole new level of innovation. Ultra roomy U-shaped cockpit seating features a clever multi-position Oasis port lounge and a swivel captain's bucket seat with a flip-up bolster. The 203 VR's standard wide band gelcoat is accented with a sport graphic and is available in Biscayne Blue, Black and Fire Red. A color-matched interior is highlighted with detailed embroidered logos. Under the hideaway engine hatch cover, a supercharged Rotax power plant and jet propulsion drivetrain deliver exciting low-end pulling power, efficient cruise and plenty of excitement on top-end. A folding arch tower is optional with board racks also available as an added extra.
